name: Magebuster: Amorous Augury
detailed_description:
The powerful spirit Xarric is summoned by Sophia, a mage who wants to make him into her servant.

Xarric fights back, beginning a magic duel.

Will he be able to defeat Sophia and keep his freedom? And if he does... What will he do to the young mage?

Features:


  • A Tense RPG-style boss
  • 6 Unique Endings
  • 1080p HD Resolution
  • Full English Voice Acting
  • An Original Soundtrack
